profile: University of Chicago, Class of 2017 (triple major in Economics, Computer Science, and Mathematics). National Merit Scholar. Inducted into Signifer, the Scarsdale, NY Senior High School academic honor society, and Tri-M, national music honor society. Developer with significant Ruby/Rails and Objective-C/Cocoa/Cocoa Touch experience.

work.name: Slader

Added ads and in-app-purchases to increase profit from mobile users
Customized mobile experience, increasing customer satisfaction
Released two new major versions with over 75,000 monthly active users

accomplishments: Prototyped new entries into the mobile space

Explored moving existing products onto mobile platforms

work.name: Continental-Aero
accomplishments: Provided email server, website and PC maintenance support to users in NJ and IL

education.name: University of Chicago
